achievements.name: Welcome to Cyrodiil
achievements.description: Escape the Imperial Sewers and complete the tutorial.

achievements.name: Champion of Cyrodiil
achievements.description: Complete the main questline and defeat Mehrunes Dagon.

achievements.name: Arch-Mage
achievements.description: Become the Arch-Mage by completing the Mages Guild questline.

achievements.name: Guildmaster
achievements.description: Complete the Fighters Guild questline and become its leader.

achievements.name: Master Thief
achievements.description: Become the Gray Fox by finishing the Thieves Guild questline.

achievements.name: Listener of the Black Hand
achievements.description: Reach the highest rank in the Dark Brotherhood.

achievements.name: Champion of the Arena
achievements.description: Win all Arena matches and become the Grand Champion.

achievements.name: Closed an Oblivion Gate
achievements.description: Closed an Oblivion Gate, Main Quest
